system.availability: All Nurgle Aligned Individuals within Character's Willpower Bonus add +1 to Agility Bonus and can make -10 Toughness Test at the start of each turn to remove 1 Fatigue. All other characters in this area suffer -1 to Agility Bonus and at the start of their turns must make +0 Willpower Test or suffer 1 Fatigue.
system.cost: Must be Dedicated to Nurgle to use. Heretical
